label: Cereale_SPBL_Export
comment: Se d√©compose en trois blocs : initialisation (du portique et temps mort tapis), acheminement et ajustement du portique.

start.nature: delay '<<enum':['delay', 'with_any', 'with_all', 'after_any', 'after_all'], <<comment':'For 'delay': the number of hours (number). For others than 'delay': all the steps's ID to which the condition relates (array).'

duration.nature: whith_any <<enum':['delay', 'cargo_tons', 'cargo_%', 'with_any', 'with_all', 'after_any', 'after_all'] <<For 'cargo_amount': the amount and unit (can be tons or percent). For others than 'cargo_amount': see start>value's comment.

machines: machine_1 <<Every listed machines start and stop together. If not, use separate step
work.distance: on_spot <<'on_spot' for static machines use, number of m for moving machine (impacting throughput calculation)
